actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage  and the target makes a DC 12 Strength check. On a failure  it is knocked prone. If the target is already prone  the ankheg can instead move up to half its Speed  dragging the target with it.

actions.name: Acid Spit
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 30 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) acid damage.
